name: King Arthur: Magic Sword
description:
Are you the king?

Everyone knows story about King Arthur and the Excalibur. Now is your turn! Can you pull magic sword from the rock? Let´s try it!

How to play:

Find the right color and pull sword, when you find her! Do it quickly, because time is running!

Music:
"Skye Cuillin" and "Danse Macabre - Xylophone" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
